summary: AN ORDINANCE providing and \_\_\_\_\_\_ and sale of serial consolidated local improvement district bonds in the principal amount of $822,961 for the purpose of funding outstanding local improvement district obligations of The City of Seattle; fixing the amount, form, date, covenants, maturities and denominations fo such bonds; establishing Consolidated Local Improvement District No. 6 and the "Consolidated Local Improvement District No. 6 Bond Redemption Fund."
